EukMetaSanity: Highly parallelized platform for eukaryote annotation
====================================================================

**EukMetaSanity** is packaged with three analysis pipelines - ``run``, ``report``, and ``refine``.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   run
   report
   refine
